title: FiveG
author: FiveG
content: Looking at effective price of altcoins ETH has not really record a bad history and very soon ETH will hit way bigger and better, if you have sphere money buy plenty of it and allow it to run for five years and watch what the outcome will be. Let's not surprise when ETH will shook the market cap of world trade many will be made billionaires and by then it will be too late for others you didn't buy at all. In shot begins to store all the relevance altcoin and wait for it. Happy Sunday

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on July 02, 2023, 03:47:35 PMLooking at effective price of altcoins ETH has not really record a bad history and very soon ETH will hit way bigger and better, if you have sphere money buy plenty of it and allow it to run for five years and watch what the outcome will be. Let's not surprise when ETH will shook the market cap of world trade many will be made billionaires and by then it will be too late for others you didn't buy at all. In shot begins to store all the relevance altcoin and wait for it. Happy SundayEthereum has come to stay but what is of concern to me is all these newbies coming out now and thinking all these big cap projects are going to give them a life changing profit. You need to look for low market cap projects that can give them 20X to 100X return on investment. Ethereum and co have made people millionaires already you need new project that can make you million unless you are a millionaire already, just like the Doge, Shib, Pepe etc millionaires were made because they got in early.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on July 02, 2023, 03:47:35 PMLooking at effective price of altcoins ETH has not really record a bad history and very soon ETH will hit way bigger and better, if you have sphere money buy plenty of it and allow it to run for five years and watch what the outcome will be. Let's not surprise when ETH will shook the market cap of world trade many will be made billionaires and by then it will be too late for others you didn't buy at all. In shot begins to store all the relevance altcoin and wait for it. Happy SundayWell, Eth is now PoS which means they are not the same decentralized blockchain before because anyone that has huge holdings of Ethereum has the huge impact on blockchain decision making. There’s no miners of it so the hype on this token is not that strong compared before when there’s a lot of interest to the project because of it’s mining profitability. Ethereum smart contract is already used by many blockchains that has a better feature. The current price of Ethereum is still in the top compared to it’s last 5 years price.I will stock other blockchain project if the goal is long term since Ethereum is like other blockchain already when they change their protocol to PoS.

comments.author: barhavsky
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on July 02, 2023, 03:47:35 PMLooking at effective price of altcoins ETH has not really record a bad history and very soon ETH will hit way bigger and better, if you have sphere money buy plenty of it and allow it to run for five years and watch what the outcome will be. Let's not surprise when ETH will shook the market cap of world trade many will be made billionaires and by then it will be too late for others you didn't buy at all. In shot begins to store all the relevance altcoin and wait for it. Happy SundayI agree with you, because Ethereum is the best altcoin to make a long term investment and with the current market conditions, this is a good opportunity to buy Ethereum at a cheap price, because I believe that in the future after the next bullrun occurs, then we cannot buy Ethereum at the current price and of course now is the right time to invest in Ethereum, so that we can get a lot of profit when the bullrun occurs.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: AbuBhakar on July 02, 2023, 08:51:08 PMWell, Eth is now PoS which means they are not the same decentralized blockchain before because anyone that has huge holdings of Ethereum has the huge impact on blockchain decision making. There’s no miners of it so the hype on this token is not that strong compared before when there’s a lot of interest to the project because of it’s mining profitability. Ethereum smart contract is already used by many blockchains that has a better feature. The current price of Ethereum is still in the top compared to it’s last 5 years price.I will stock other blockchain project if the goal is long term since Ethereum is like other blockchain already when they change their protocol to PoS.About that decision making process... In your comparison, how do the ETH whales on POS differ from huge mining farms we had in POW? POS even has slashing to keep bad actors away. I haven't yet encountered anyone who has answered me about this. Maybe i am just ignorant but i would like to know, because right now if i had to guess this fud just seems to be coming from miners that are out of jobs.

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: its indeed a good investment not to mention after the corrections that was caused by series of company and top coins collapsing its now rather undervalued.but we still need to understand that if not with big capital to invest then it seemed more likely your profit that you get from holding even for that long would not be massive.at best it would be two times or even three times of your initial investment which honestly already good enough if that really what turns out to be but also rather underwhelming if you don't have thatbig of a capital, that just means your gain would be just some measly amount that can be scoffed at. if you think you have the capital then ahead.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Ethereum is indeed good for long-term investment, as Ethereum right now is the biggest allocation in my bag.If Bitcoin will stay, Ethereum will also. Right now, there's no threat at all on Ethereum or there's no project that is on the way to beat Ethereum, they are far away.As Decentralized Finance (DeFi) continues to grow, Ethereum is the most who will benefit from the rapidly growing ecosystem on DeFi.

comments.author: bitterguy28
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on July 02, 2023, 03:47:35 PMLooking at effective price of altcoins ETH has not really record a bad history and very soon ETH will hit way bigger and better,what is about that "Very Soon thing" we may expect ? how soon that what bitcoin may gather?Quote if you have sphere money buy plenty of it and allow it to run for five years and watch what the outcome will be.Spare money and not Sphere mate.and why Ethereum when we can do first invest in Bitcoin ? what made you think giving this much attention to altcoins?Quote Let's not surprise when ETH will shook the market cap of world trade many will be made billionaires and by then it will be too late for others you didn't buy at all. In shot begins to store all the relevance altcoin and wait for it. Happy Sundaybut I will be surprised if found out  that you kept pushing people to invest but you are not giving one?

comments.author: Sebas.tian
comments.body: I agree with you OP, Ethereum has a good record by maintaining second position among other cryptocurrencies and many holders has made a lot of incomes from Ethereum and they are very ready to invest more on Ethereum so that they will be part of those that will rejoice when the price increase to $2000. The price of Ethereum is still $1,743 in the market, and it will be favourable for anyone to buy and hold like 4 or 5 years before he or she can sell, because the price of Ethereum will reach $20,000 before the end of the 5 years. I believe Ethereum teams will not allow their customers to regret in future than to do everything possible within their power to make the market look good for them to achieve something good.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: So far ETH has been a very good crypto investment, but given the high price at the moment it's difficult for small traders to invest here let's say the price goes high above $5k it won't give much profit anyway there are much better cryptos that always have an edge such as cheaper transaction fees such as BNB, MATIC and ARBITRUM or others which are still relatively cheap so they can be a good investment.There are many drawbacks to ETH, namely the transaction costs are unstable and tend to be high making it difficult to attract other traders to invest in ETH, maybe it will be a profitable investment for traders who have a lot of money to buy some ETH for future investment at least one or two years ahead crypto prices will increase following the bitcoin halving in the next year.

comments.author: TheSpiral
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on July 02, 2023, 03:47:35 PMLooking at effective price of altcoins ETH has not really record a bad history and very soon ETH will hit way bigger and better, if you have sphere money buy plenty of it and allow it to run for five years and watch what the outcome will be. Let's not surprise when ETH will shook the market cap of world trade many will be made billionaires and by then it will be too late for others you didn't buy at all. In shot begins to store all the relevance altcoin and wait for it. Happy SundayI agree with your opinion about Ethereum. many time we have seen bad market where all altcoins dumped bloodly. In these five years many coins lost their trader trust but Ethereum is still most powerful altcoins and perhaps it is second after btc I will suggest for every long term holder. In the bull season Eth rised up above 4k$ to create ATH and after bad market situation its dumped to 1k$ also but if we see the current price then it is looking so healthy. Ethereum strong utility and usecase is the key to make it Trusty and coin for long term. i am holding in small quantity but in future looking to increase time hy time

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on July 02, 2023, 03:47:35 PMLooking at effective price of altcoins ETH has not really record a bad history and very soon ETH will hit way bigger and better, if you have sphere money buy plenty of it and allow it to run for five years and watch what the outcome will be. Let's not surprise when ETH will shook the market cap of world trade many will be made billionaires and by then it will be too late for others you didn't buy at all. In shot begins to store all the relevance altcoin and wait for it. Happy SundayIm expect ethereum to go to the its ATH before it will break another record. that thing will possible to happen only if bitcoin will reach another all time high again. That being said that buy both bitcoin and ethereum for long term. Bitcoin has been recovering so fast as well as ethereum since it was traded at the bottom at the earliest of this year. What you have said above was actually make sense but im feeling doubt if people gonna hear it as they will not able to make a profit in short term. I meant they shall put eth as long term investment. Short term will not even work in this kind of coin. It's caused by big marketcap makes it even hader to be pumped and dumped by traders.

comments.author: o48o
comments.created_time: July 04, 2023, 04:08:43 PMLast edit: July 04, 2023, 04:48:42 PM by o48o
comments.body: Quote from: makishart on July 04, 2023, 03:56:11 PMIm expect ethereum to go to the its ATH before it will break another record. that thing will possible to happen only if bitcoin will reach another all time high again. That being said that buy both bitcoin and ethereum for long term. Bitcoin has been recovering so fast as well as ethereum since it was traded at the bottom at the earliest of this year. What you have said above was actually make sense but im feeling doubt if people gonna hear it as they will not able to make a profit in short term. I meant they shall put eth as long term investment. Short term will not even work in this kind of coin. It's caused by big marketcap makes it even hader to be pumped and dumped by traders. Imho it also depends on fundamentals. IF ETH manages to scale (cut the fees and increase the speed while increasing transactions), it might as well surpass BTC in marketcap. I know people have been waiting flippening for a long time and when it seems to be closer there will be even harsher crash.I am basing this on my feelings on the markets and rather long experience i have with crypto markets. Eth doesn't need Vitalik as a central figure anymore and Vitalik doesn't seem to want to jump the ship every time like Daniel Larimer.

comments.body: Quote from: o48o on July 04, 2023, 04:08:43 PMQuote from: makishart on July 04, 2023, 03:56:11 PMIm expect ethereum to go to the its ATH before it will break another record. that thing will possible to happen only if bitcoin will reach another all time high again. Short term will not even work in this kind of coin. It's caused by big marketcap makes it even hader to be pumped and dumped by traders. Imho it also depends on fundamentals. IF ETH manages to scale (cut the fees and increase the såeed while increasing transactions), it might as well surpass BTC in marketcap. I know people have been waiting flippening for a long time and when it seems to be closer there will be even harsher crash.I am basing this on my feelings on the markets and rather long experience i have with crypto markets. Eth doesn't need Vitalik as a central figure anymore and Vitalik doesn't seem to want to jump the ship every time like Daniel Larimer.Those who have huge holdings, will not need pumpin anymore. They are already rich and with their coin POS, every week is like winning a lottery for those guys. Those from institutions are going to stake of course, these are the guys who want to make money using the money. Anyone would want to be part of the network to make money, it's the price that is preventing poor people from investing.  The recent news you can find today is that Vilatik is not staking his ETH. He sure is not like those guys.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on July 04, 2023, 04:45:45 PMThose who have huge holdings, will not need pumpin anymore. They are already rich and with their coin POS, every week is like winning a lottery for those guys. Those from institutions are going to stake of course, these are the guys who want to make money using the money. Anyone would want to be part of the network to make money, it's the price that is preventing poor people from investing.  The recent news you can find today is that Vilatik is not staking his ETH. He sure is not like those guys.Define huge holdings. Price is always relative, and number of "full coins" doesn''t matter. Just % of the tokens you own of the supply and value of them.The fact that Vitalik isn't taking part to consensus is a very good thing, because his share of it (and the power coming with that) would be too big imho.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on July 02, 2023, 03:47:35 PMLooking at effective price of altcoins ETH has not really record a bad history and very soon ETH will hit way bigger and better, if you have sphere money buy plenty of it and allow it to run for five years and watch what the outcome will be. I hope you are not giving professional advise. Anyway what you have said is not far from the truth. Etheruem has really been under estimated or under priced given that it has coins under its blockchain which is suppose to be a boost in price for it. Back in ico days, almost all the coins that existed five years ago where erc20. Also, etheruem as the leader of altcoins have not had a separate bull run outside from bitcoin so I'm still expecting that to happen and optimistic is going to be a turn around to the real value of etheruem.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Of course, Ethereum is the second best coin after Bitcoin, and it is expected to have a very big future, so the strategy of consolidation in this bear market is very strategic in the long run.When bull season starts we will surely see very big numbers.

comments.author: riskarcher
comments.body: Especially SEC Allowing ETH trading in other exchange so we don't worry if anything happen on the crypto market due to ETH have big founder and big whales behind them and i'm believe as holder of Ecosystem ETH coins already  Developed to be better and never doubt with the best altcoin i have since 2017 until now
